content: one round work in k2 p2 ribbing for 20 rounds or until the cuff measures 5 cm cast off with your preferred method repeat these instructions for the second sleeve weave in all the ends hand wash gently lay flat to day and block your sweater wear it and dance a little happy dance feel free to share pictures of your knitting and your finished sweater don t forget to use the hashtags #callmelondonjumper and #martinaknits or tag me @m_art_inak on instagram pattern copyright by martina maskova @m_art_inak 2023 for personal use only 10 useful tips and tutorials from me how i cast on how i knit how i purl how i knit short row how i knit fair isle how i catch floats pattern copyright by martina maskova @m_art_inak 2023 for personal use only 11 how i weave in as i knit part i how i weave in as i knit part ii how i transfer stitches pattern copyright by martina maskova @m_art_inak 2023 for personal use only 12
